mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOLUNTEER ( VOLUN_NO, VT_BS_NAME, VT_TITLE, VT_PLACE, VT_RECRUIT_START, VT_RECRUIT_END, VT_WORK_START, VT_WORK_END, VT_ING, VT_NAME, VT_USER_PHONE, VT_USER_EMAIL, BS_NO, USER_NO ) VALUES (volun_PJ_SEQ.nextval,#{vt_bs_name},#{vt_title},#{vt_place}, '2022-05-20','2022-06-08','2022-06-08','2022-06-09', 1,#{vt_name},#{vt_user_phone},#{vt_user_email},#{bs_no},#{user_no})
mapper.update: update bongsa set bs_success_cnt = bs_success_cnt+1 where bs_no=#{bs_no}
mapper.select: select * from volunteer where bs_no=#{bs_no} and user_no = #{user_no}
select count(volun_no) as totalRecCount from volunteer where user_no = ${select}

select v.* , b.bs_img_name from volunteer v , bongsa b where v.bs_no = b.bs_no and volun_no in(select volun_no from (select volun_no,rownum AS rnum from (select volun_no from volunteer where user_no = ${select} order by volun_no desc)) where rnum >= #{firstRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}) order by v.volun_no desc
